verses.text:
And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and fetched \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* it into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w* in the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And it came to pass, \w while|strong="H3117"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, that the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* was \w long|strong="H7235"\w*; for it was \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w lamented|strong="H5091"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If ye do \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* with all your \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*, \add then\add* put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* and \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you, and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* your \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him only: and he will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* you out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

Then the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w* and \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* only.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Gather|strong="H6908"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w*, and I will \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* for you unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*, and \w drew|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and poured \add it\add* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* there, We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w*.

And when the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w*, the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, they were \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w Cease|strong="H2790"\w* not to \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for us, that he will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.\f + \fr 7.8 \ft Cease…: Heb. Be not silent from us from crying\f*

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w sucking|strong="H2461"\w* \w lamb|strong="H2924"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \add it for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w wholly|strong="H3632"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* him.  +  r 7.9  t heard: or, answered *

And as \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* was offering \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* drew \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w thundered|strong="H7481"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* upon the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w discomfited|strong="H2000"\w* them; and they were \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*, and \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them, until \add they came\add* under \w Beth-car|strong="H1033"\w*.

Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* between \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w* and \w Shen|strong="H8129"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of it \w Eben-ezer|strong="H0072"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Hitherto hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* us.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft Eben-ezer: that is, The stone of help\f*

¶ So the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* were \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w*, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* into the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was against the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.

And the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, from \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* even unto \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*; and the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* thereof did \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* out of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. And there was \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* between \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*.
And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

And he \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1767"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* to \w year|strong="H8141"\w* in \w circuit|strong="H5437"\w* to \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*, and \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in all those \w places|strong="H4725"\w*.\f + \fr 7.16 \ft in circuit: Heb. and he circuited\f*

And his \w return|strong="H8666"\w* \add was\add* to \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*; for there \add was\add* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and there he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and there he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
